docs.snippet: Secret Meetings--Significant Circulars--Public Sentiment on States Island--Movement for aPermanent Police Force at the Marine Hospital During the Quarantine Season. The receipt lately to anonymous letters by the Health Officers and Commissioners of...
docs.lead_paragraph: Secret Meetings--Significant Circulars--Public Sentiment on States Island--Movement for aPermanent Police Force at the Marine Hospital During the Quarantine Season. The receipt lately to anonymous letters by the Health Officers and Commissioners of Emigration, announcing that an attempt would be made to burn the Quarantine buildings at Stapleton, Staten Island, and warning them to remove the sick outside of the inclosure, has renewed some of the excitement of last Summer.

docs.snippet: The principal event of the week in the World of Amusement will be the production to-night of MEYERBEER's Opera of "Les Huguenots" at the Academy of Music. Mr. ULLMAN intends by this revival to test the public appreciation for this kind of...
docs.lead_paragraph: The principal event of the week in the World of Amusement will be the production to-night of MEYERBEER's Opera of "Les Huguenots" at the Academy of Music. Mr. ULLMAN intends by this revival to test the public appreciation for this kind of amusement--in which the show is at least as important as the music.
